tuv.seg: This document describes the established Leaving Certificate programme
Tá cur síos anseo ar an Ardteistiméireacht Bhunaithe
Leaving Certificate examination fees
Táillí scrúdaithe na hArdteistiméireachta
Students taking the State Leaving Certificate examinations must pay examination fees
Ní mór do dhaltaí atá ag déanamh na hArdteistiméireachta táillí a íoc
Information on fees and exemptions from them
Eolas maidir le táillí agus maidir leo siúd atá díolmhaithe uathu
The Leaving Certificate Applied is a two-year, self-contained programme aimed at recognising the talents of all students and providing opportunities to prepare for working and adult life
Cur síos ar an Ardteistiméireacht Fheidhmeach
Ireland's Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme (LCVP) is a senior cycle programme designed to give a strong vocational dimension to the Established Leaving Certificate
Cur síos ar Ghairmchlár na hArdteistiméireachta
The Junior Certificate examination is held at the end of the three-year Junior Cycle in second-level schools
Cur síos ar Chlár an Teastais Shóisearaigh
State examination arrangements for children with disabilities
Socruithe scrúdaithe do scoláirí faoi mhíchumas
Special arrangements are in place for children with disabilities who are taking State examinations
Tá socruithe speisialta i bhfeidhm do leanaí le míchumas a bhfuil scrúduithe Stáit á ndéanamh acu
Appealing the Leaving Certificate results
Achomharc a dhéanamh in aghaidh torthaí na hArdteistiméireachta
Describes the procedures to follow if you wish to appeal the results of your Leaving Certificate examinations
Conas achomharc a dhéanamh in aghaidh do thorthaí i scrúdú na hArdteistiméireachta
The State Examinations Commission
Coimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit
Describes the work of the State Examinations Commission
Cur síos ar obair Choimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit
Most Read in "Education and Training"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Liúntais Bhreisoideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO)
